title: Add an indicator to required fields
author: josh-hoiland

comments.body: Done! I'm actually surprised how few fields are actually required in most objects

I'm surprised too. I think the issue is that some fields are only conditionally required. For example, you'll get an error if you try to create a pod without a container image even though it's not marked as required, but the docs say: "This field is optional to allow higher level config management to default or override container images in workload controllers like Deployments and StatefulSets."

Really useful tool, btw. Thanks!

title: Make change history collapsed by default
body: The first item of the ChangeList is set to default open. I think it would look cleaner and be easier to navigate if the first item was collapsed by default. The changes can be extremely long making the user have to scroll a lot. I think most users would be skipping over these change logs to see the Examples instead.
